comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:9.0a1) Gecko/20110821 Firefox/9.0a1
Build ID: 20110821030758

Steps to reproduce:

opened two tabs, and hovered on the inactive one


Actual results:

The color jumped straight to the light 'hover' image.



Expected results:

The color to fade as it did in 3.6
comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:9.0a1) Gecko/20110821 Firefox/9.0a1
Build ID: 20110821030758

Steps to reproduce:

opened two tabs, and hovered on the inactive one


Actual results:

The color jumped straight to the light 'hover' image.



Expected results:

The color to fade as it did in 3.6

I presume your using an Extension for coloring the Tabs?

Is your Issue reproducible in Safe-Mode?
https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Safe+Mode
